Name: Card Master Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed with Card Master's power that enables Double Jump.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed with Card Master's power that enables Double Jump. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Autopilot is available only on Victoria Island and some other continents. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed with Card Master's power that enables Double Jump.
